amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Community colleges; role and mission assignments.
amendatorysection.para: The role and mission assignments enumerated in sections 85-960 to 85-965 shall apply to the community college system and its areas and campuses. Such assignments shall prohibit, limit, or restrict only those programs or services provided for under such sections.
